basics.name: Rodrigo de Souza Castro
basics.label: Android & Flutter Developer
basics.summary: Android Developer with 6 years of experience, certified by Udacity Android Nanodegree and The App Brewery Flutter Bootcamp. Has experience in small projects from startups to large projects of financial institutions.

work.summary: Easynvest is the second largest independent broker in the country
highlights: Member of the security team on Easynvest
Evolution of a worldwide hypermarket network application.
Evolution and code review of an application from a large financial institution.
Implementation of a chat (lib) tool for the main application of a large financial institution.
Assistance and participation in the evolution of the main application.
Evolution of a SalesForce application that is the company's flagship product.
Assistance in the projects of other Android teams.
Creation and maintenance of applications for startups, mostly projects from 3 to 8 weeks.
Taxi application projects, cattle management, legal correspondents among others.

volunteer.summary: The Google Developers Group of Sao Paulo is an open group of Google technology enthusiasts.

education.institution: Federal University of Mato Grosso do Sul
